title: 332: CHATTY BROS: Plug Somethin’! + “Men Tell All” Bach Recap!
itunes:title: 332: CHATTY BROS: Plug Somethin’! + “Men Tell All” Bach Recap!
description:
The Bros are here to recap and chat - Viking style (with no explanation)! They discuss their holidays, recap the latest Bachelorette “Men Tell All” episode, and THEN they have their first official “PLUG SOMETHIN’!” segment! Thank you to all the broads and bros who sent in amazing stuff! PRO TIP: you may want to watch this on Youtube and lots of candy crunching involved! 

 

WATCH YOUTUBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SQUARESPACE: go to SQUARESPACE.COM/CHATTY for a free trial and use code CHATTY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain!

***OAK ESSENTIALS: go to OAKESSENTIALS.COM and get the entire 5-step routine for $195 or try your first product for 15% off when you use code CHATTY at checkout!

***BLENDERS: get 15% off your Blenders purchase at BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM/CHATTYVIP

***THRIVE MARKET: get 30% off first order AND a free gift at THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY

***EVITE: go to EVITE.COM/CHATTY to choose from thousands of design options to create and send invitations for free!

 

BROADS/BRO SOCIALS/STORES FROM PLUG SOMETHIN’:

*Solstice (Robes): @solsticeintimates

*Germstar Luxe Hand Sanitizer: @germstar_us www.germstar.com

*Freaks By Me: @freaksbyme www.freaksbyme.com

*The Obvious Shirts Logo: www.obviousshirts.com

*Wild Lather Cold Process Soap: @wildlather www.wildlather.com

*ItyDity Music Producers: @itydity www.itydity.com

*Anissa Riviere Painting: @anissa_riviere https://www.etsy.com/shop/AnissaRiviere

*Candies Lebanese Kitchen: @candieslebanesekitchen https://venmo.com/u/candieslebanesekitchen

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
